body:
Comment 2 by **netprobe**: 
Worth to note the initial code that the problem was noticed in
(https://github.com/mulander/goresize/blob/master/goresize.go).

Posting it since that's a bit longer running then the reduced example.
The purpose of goresize is to resize all jpeg/jpg files in the current working directory
storing the resized files.

It will take a solid time to process a larger number of files. On my box regardless of
the input it still doesn't produce any output on linux.

Running the code requires a manual checkout of the app engine repository linked in the
code.
